channel.title: Request - blank highscores template
channel.description:
Could somebody provide me with a blank highscores template with the php included? No design or w.e. just a functional template that I can use :P
I'm sure others may benefit from this?
For those asking why I can't do this myself? A: I can, besides learn php :D and keeping my priority's right :)

item.title: Request - blank highscores template
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Already made my own blank, could somebody close this?

Read full topic

item.title: Request - blank highscores template
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:18, topic:523260”]You could just parse the RS highscores into your own template. For example:

/**
* Pass the users username in an $_POST variable from a form
*/
$username = $_POST['username'];

/**
* Get the contents of the highscores for that user and trim the whitespace
*/
$fn = trim(@file_get_contents('http://hiscore.runescape.com/index_lite.ws?player='.$username));

/**
* Exploding the file into the $stats array
*/
$stats = explode(',',$fn);

After doing that you should echo out the array and match the values to what you find on the actual RS highscores then you can start adding styling. You can see my version of it here.[/quote]

ew no

I’ll just do it myself

/thread idfc

Read full topic

item.title: Request - blank highscores template
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

You could just parse the RS highscores into your own template. For example:

/**
* Pass the users username in an $_POST variable from a form
*/
$username = $_POST['username'];

/**
* Get the contents of the highscores for that user and trim the whitespace
*/
$fn = trim(@file_get_contents('http://hiscore.runescape.com/index_lite.ws?player='.$username));

/**
* Exploding the file into the $stats array
*/
$stats = explode(',',$fn);

After doing that you should echo out the array and match the values to what you find on the actual RS highscores then you can start adding styling. You can see my version of it here.

Read full topic

item.title: Request - blank highscores template
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:5, topic:523260”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=641811.msg4324559#msg4324559 date=1372680348]
Why don’t you simply take the layout, and make it blank?
[/quote]

Why don’t you do it for me
plz :D[/quote]Now why on earth would I do something like that? It’s basic CSS to make a blank-style template. Although, I did have a highscores page that I was working on a while back. It’s somewhat blank (only has the skilling images in it), but it needs some work. Not everything is going where it should be, and I haven’t worked on it for quite sometime. It’s actually pretty sloppy.

Either way, making a blank template is extremely easy to do. In fact, why don’t you just make a template from scratch? CSS is very easy to do. Web design in general is. I don’t support the idea of spoonfeeding, or doing something for you. Although, I am more than happy to give you my assistance in making the template when needed.

Read full topic
